name: Cyperum
description:
Find your own harmony and peace in our sandbox experience! This harmony can differ per person, and you can create it yourself by collecting different blocks. 

Each Block has its own color and track. As soon as you put these blocks together in on the platform, the tracks are combined with each other. You get to the blocks by walking around and searching. The blocks are placed in random places every time you play the game again.

The game is a pure sandbox, so enjoy the peace and serenity.

Controls:

W.A.S.D. - Walking

E - Grab/Interact

Mouse - Look

Esc - Pause

Note: Testing builds spawn  15 blocks of every color near spawn. RC builds are the normal game.
